DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate safety efficacy intravenous fish oil emulsion ( omegaven ) infant parenteral nutrition associate cholestasis .
DOC.brief_title: Compassionate Use Intravenous Fish Oil Emulsion Infants With Cholestasis
DOC.criteria: Cholestasis define either serum bilirubin > 2mg/dL ( two measurement least 8d apart ) respond 4 week intralipid reduce 1 g/kg/d trace mineral limit twice weekly , OR serum bilirubin > 6 mg/dL ( single measurement ) rising , absence proven suspect sepsis Age > 1y time omegaven start Not expect survive least 30 day Fish allergy first degree relative Hemodynamic instability Coagulopathy Not likely require PN > 30d Not expect survive > 30d
